cards.rules_text:

or Desert card not named Crumbling Sands?

Old Note: The intention was to add a Field of Ruin to the format, and with the desert typing being a relevant typing and thematic I decided to give it that typing too. I could see it being able to put a Desert into play could make it too good, so feel free to evaluate it as not searching for a Desert card and just a desert Field of Ruin that puts the land into play tapped.
